mapper.select: select t.pk_id as orgId,t.org_name as orgName from C_SYS_ORGANIZATION t where t.delete_flag='1' and t.schema_name=#{schemaName} and t.parent_id=#{orgId}
select t.catalog_code as catalogCode,t.catalog_name as catalogName from c_commodity_catalog t where t.delete_flag='1' and t.status='2' and t.schema_name= #{schemaName}

select t.brand_code brandCode, (select b.brand_name from c_commodity_brand b where b.delete_flag='1' and b.status='2' and b.schema_name=t.schema_name and b.brand_code=t.brand_code)as brandName from c_commodity_catalog2brand t where t.delete_flag='1' and t.schema_name=#{schemaName}
and t.catalog_code=#{catalogCode}

select tot.schema_name schemaName,
tot.org_id orgId, tot.supplier_id supplierId, (select t.supplier_name as supplierName from purchase_supplier t where t.pk_id=tot.supplier_id) as supplier,
t1.commodity_name commodityName, t1.commodity_code commodityCode, tot.commodity_pk_id, (select t2.brand_name from c_commodity_brand t2 where t2.delete_flag='1' and t1.schema_name=t2.schema_name and t2.brand_code=t1.brand_code) as brandName, (select t3.catalog_name from c_commodity_catalog t3 where t3.delete_flag=1 and t1.schema_name=t3.schema_name and t3.catalog_code=t1.catalog_code) as catalogName, (select t4.model_name from c_commodity_model t4 where t4.delete_flag=1 and t1.schema_name=t4.schema_name and t4.model_code=t1.model_code ) as modelName,
(select t5.org_name from c_sys_organization t5 where tot.org_id=t5.pk_id) as orgName,
ps.price_method priceMethod, ps.price_ratio priceRatio, ps.supplier_name supplierName ,
tot.exchangeSaleOutCount exchangeSaleOutCount, tot.exchangeSaleInCount exchangeSaleInCount, tot.exchangeSaleInAmount exchangeSaleInAmount, tot.exchangeSaleOutAmount exchangeSaleOutAmount, tot.returnNumGift returnNumGift, tot.returnNum returnNum, tot.returnAmount returnAmount,
tot.inventoryNum inventoryNum, tot.refundsCount refundsCount, tot.refundsAmount refundsAmount, tot.wareInCount wareInCount, tot.wareInAmount wareInAmount, tot.exchangeInCount exchangeInCount, tot.exchangeInAmount exchangeInAmount, tot.exchangeGiftInCount exchangeGiftInCount, tot.exchangeGiftOutCount exchangeGiftOutCount, tot.exchangeOutCount exchangeOutCount, tot.exchangeOutAmount exchangeOutAmount
, tot.accountAmount accountAmount
from( select tt1.schema_name,
tt1.commodity_pk_id,
tt1.org_id, tt1.supplier_id, tt.exchangeSaleOutCount, tt2.exchangeSaleInCount, tt.exchangeSaleOutAmount , tt2.exchangeSaleInAmount , tt22.exchangeGiftInCount, tt11.exchangeGiftOutCount , tt3.returnNumGift returnNumGift, tt4.returnNum returnNum, tt4.returnAmount returnAmount, tt5.inventoryNum, t22.refundsCount, t22.refundsAmount, t33.wareInCount, t33.wareInAmount, t44.exchangeInCount, t44.exchangeInAmount, t55.exchangeOutCount, t55.exchangeOutAmount
, t66.accountAmount
from (select cd.schema_name, cd.org_id,cad.supplier_id
, cad.commodity_pk_id,cad.commodity_code
from market_commodity_add_details cad,market_commodity_add cd where cd.order_status='1' and cad.delete_flag='1' and cd.delete_flag='1' and cad.details_status='1' and cad.operation_type='2' and cd.last_up_time between #{start} and #{end} and cd.schema_name=cad.schema_name
and cd.org_id in
#{org}
and cd.org_id =#{orgId}
and cad.supplier_id=#{supplierId}
and cd.schema_name= #{schemaName} and cad.order_number=cd.order_number group by cd.schema_name, cd.org_id,cad.supplier_id
, cad.commodity_code,cad.commodity_pk_id
union
select mcr.schema_name,mcr.org_id,crd.supplier_id
,crd.commodity_code ,(select c.pk_id from c_commodity c where c.org_id=mcr.org_id and c.commodity_code=crd.commodity_code) as commodity_pk_id
from market_commodity_returns mcr,rket_commodity_returns_details crd where mcr.order_status=2 and mcr.delete_flag='1' and crd.delete_flag='1' and crd.details_status='2' and crd.operation_type='2' and mcr.last_up_time between #{start} and #{end} and mcr.schema_name=crd.schema_name
and mcr.org_id in
#{org}
and mcr.org_id =#{orgId}
and crd.supplier_id=#{supplierId}
and mcr.schema_name=#{schemaName} and mcr.order_number=crd.order_number group by mcr.schema_name,mcr.org_id,crd.supplier_id
,crd.commodity_code ) tt1 left join
(select cd.schema_name , cd.org_id,cad.supplier_id,
cad.commodity_pk_id, cad.commodity_code,
sum(cad.commodity_price*cad.commodity_num) exchangeSaleOutAmount, sum(cad.commodity_num) exchangeSaleOutCount from market_commodity_add_details cad,market_commodity_add cd ,c_commodity c where 1=1
and c.commodity_code like '%'||#{commodityCode, jdbcType=VARCHAR}||'%'
and c.commodity_name like '%'||#{commodityName, jdbcType=VARCHAR}||'%'
and c.brand_code=#{brandName, jdbcType=VARCHAR}
and c.catalog_code=#{catalogName, jdbcType=VARCHAR}
and c.model_code=#{modelName, jdbcType=VARCHAR}
and cad.commodity_pk_id=c.pk_id
and cd.order_status='3' and cad.delete_flag='1' and cd.delete_flag='1' and cad.details_status='3' and cad.operation_type='2' and cad.complimentary_mark='0' and cd.last_up_time between #{start, jdbcType=VARCHAR} and #{end, jdbcType=VARCHAR}
and cd.schema_name=cad.schema_name and cad.order_number=cd.order_number group by cd.schema_name, cd.org_id,cad.supplier_id
, cad.commodity_code,cad.commodity_pk_id
) tt on tt1.schema_name =tt.schema_name and tt1.org_id =tt.org_id and tt1.supplier_id =tt.supplier_id and tt1.commodity_code =tt.commodity_code
left join
(select mcr.schema_name,mcr.org_id,crd.supplier_id
,crd.commodity_code
,sum(crd.commodity_num*crd.commodity_price) exchangeSaleInAmount ,sum(crd.commodity_num) exchangeSaleInCount from market_commodity_returns mcr,rket_commodity_returns_details crd ,c_commodity c where 1=1
and c.commodity_code like '%'||#{commodityCode, jdbcType=VARCHAR}||'%'
and c.commodity_name like '%'||#{commodityName, jdbcType=VARCHAR}||'%'
and c.brand_code=#{brandName, jdbcType=VARCHAR}
and c.catalog_code=#{catalogName, jdbcType=VARCHAR}
and c.model_code=#{modelName, jdbcType=VARCHAR}
and mcr.org_id=c.org_id and crd.commodity_code=c.commodity_code
and mcr.order_status='4' and mcr.delete_flag='1' and crd.delete_flag='1' and crd.details_status='4' and crd.operation_type='2' and crd.complimentary_mark='0' and mcr.last_up_time between #{start} and #{end} and mcr.schema_name=crd.schema_name and mcr.order_number=crd.order_number group by mcr.schema_name,mcr.org_id,crd.supplier_id ,crd.commodity_code ) tt2 on tt1.schema_name =tt2.schema_name and tt1.org_id =tt2.org_id and tt1.supplier_id =tt2.supplier_id
and tt1.commodity_code =tt2.commodity_code
left join
(select cd.schema_name , cd.org_id,cad.supplier_id,
cad.commodity_pk_id, cad.commodity_code,
sum(cad.commodity_num) exchangeGiftOutCount from market_commodity_add_details cad,market_commodity_add cd ,c_commodity c where 1=1
and c.commodity_code like '%'||#{commodityCode, jdbcType=VARCHAR}||'%'
and c.commodity_name like '%'||#{commodityName, jdbcType=VARCHAR}||'%'
and c.brand_code=#{brandName, jdbcType=VARCHAR}
and c.catalog_code=#{catalogName, jdbcType=VARCHAR}
and c.model_code=#{modelName, jdbcType=VARCHAR}
and cad.commodity_pk_id=c.pk_id
and cd.order_status='3' and cad.delete_flag='1' and cd.delete_flag='1' and cad.details_status='3' and cad.operation_type='2' and cad.complimentary_mark='1' and cd.last_up_time between #{start, jdbcType=VARCHAR} and #{end, jdbcType=VARCHAR}
and cd.schema_name=cad.schema_name and cad.order_number=cd.order_number group by cd.schema_name, cd.org_id,cad.supplier_id
, cad.commodity_code,cad.commodity_pk_id
) tt11 on tt1.schema_name =tt11.schema_name and tt1.org_id =tt11.org_id and tt1.supplier_id =tt11.supplier_id and tt1.commodity_code =tt11.commodity_code
left join
(select mcr.schema_name,mcr.org_id,crd.supplier_id
,crd.commodity_code
,sum(crd.commodity_num) exchangeGiftInCount from market_commodity_returns mcr,rket_commodity_returns_details crd ,c_commodity c where 1=1
and c.commodity_code like '%'||#{commodityCode, jdbcType=VARCHAR}||'%'
and c.commodity_name like '%'||#{commodityName, jdbcType=VARCHAR}||'%'
and c.brand_code=#{brandName, jdbcType=VARCHAR}
and c.catalog_code=#{catalogName, jdbcType=VARCHAR}
and c.model_code=#{modelName, jdbcType=VARCHAR}
and mcr.org_id=c.org_id and crd.commodity_code=c.commodity_code
and mcr.order_status='4' and mcr.delete_flag='1' and crd.delete_flag='1' and crd.details_status='4' and crd.operation_type='2' and crd.complimentary_mark='1' and mcr.last_up_time between #{start} and #{end} and mcr.schema_name=crd.schema_name and mcr.order_number=crd.order_number group by mcr.schema_name,mcr.org_id,crd.supplier_id ,crd.commodity_code ) tt22 on tt1.schema_name =tt22.schema_name and tt1.org_id =tt22.org_id and tt1.supplier_id =tt22.supplier_id
and tt1.commodity_code =tt22.commodity_code
left join
(select mcr.schema_name,mcr.org_id,crd.supplier_id
,crd.commodity_code
,sum(crd.commodity_num) returnNumGift from market_commodity_returns mcr,rket_commodity_returns_details crd ,c_commodity c where 1=1
and c.commodity_code like '%'||#{commodityCode, jdbcType=VARCHAR}||'%'
and c.commodity_name like '%'||#{commodityName, jdbcType=VARCHAR}||'%'
and c.brand_code=#{brandName, jdbcType=VARCHAR}
and c.catalog_code=#{catalogName, jdbcType=VARCHAR}
and c.model_code=#{modelName, jdbcType=VARCHAR}
and mcr.org_id=c.org_id and crd.commodity_code=c.commodity_code
and mcr.order_status='2' and mcr.delete_flag='1' and crd.delete_flag='1' and crd.details_status='2' and crd.operation_type='2' and crd.complimentary_mark='1' and mcr.last_up_time between #{start} and #{end} and mcr.schema_name=crd.schema_name and mcr.order_number=crd.order_number group by mcr.schema_name,mcr.org_id,crd.supplier_id ,crd.commodity_code ) tt3 on tt1.schema_name =tt3.schema_name and tt1.org_id =tt3.org_id and tt1.supplier_id =tt3.supplier_id
and tt1.commodity_code =tt3.commodity_code
left join
(select mcr.schema_name,mcr.org_id,crd.supplier_id ,crd.commodity_code ,sum(crd.commodity_num) returnNum,sum(crd.commodity_num*crd.commodity_price) returnAmount from market_commodity_returns mcr,rket_commodity_returns_details crd ,c_commodity c where 1=1
and c.commodity_code like '%'||#{commodityCode, jdbcType=VARCHAR}||'%'
and c.commodity_name like '%'||#{commodityName, jdbcType=VARCHAR}||'%'
and c.brand_code=#{brandName, jdbcType=VARCHAR}
and c.catalog_code=#{catalogName, jdbcType=VARCHAR}
and c.model_code=#{modelName, jdbcType=VARCHAR}
and mcr.org_id=c.org_id and crd.commodity_code=c.commodity_code
and mcr.order_status='2' and mcr.delete_flag='1' and crd.delete_flag='1' and crd.details_status='2' and crd.operation_type='2' and crd.complimentary_mark='0' and mcr.last_up_time between #{start} and #{end} and mcr.schema_name=crd.schema_name and mcr.order_number=crd.order_number group by mcr.schema_name,mcr.org_id,crd.supplier_id ,crd.commodity_code ) tt4 on tt1.schema_name =tt4.schema_name and tt1.org_id =tt4.org_id and tt1.supplier_id =tt4.supplier_id
and tt1.commodity_code =tt4.commodity_code
left join
(select ii.schema_name,ii.supplier_id,swi.org_id ,ii.commodity_info_id ,sum(ii.quantity_on_hand) inventoryNum from inventory_item ii,storage_warehouse_info swi ,c_commodity c where 1=1
and c.commodity_code like '%'||#{commodityCode, jdbcType=VARCHAR}||'%'
and c.commodity_name like '%'||#{commodityName, jdbcType=VARCHAR}||'%'
and c.brand_code=#{brandName, jdbcType=VARCHAR}
and c.catalog_code=#{catalogName, jdbcType=VARCHAR}
and c.model_code=#{modelName, jdbcType=VARCHAR}
and ii.commodity_info_id=c.pk_id
and ii.delete_flag='1' and ii.operation_type='2' and ii.warehouse_id=swi.pk_id group by ii.schema_name,ii.supplier_id,swi.org_id ,ii.commodity_info_id ) tt5 on tt1.schema_name = tt5.schema_name and tt1.org_id=tt5.org_id and tt1.supplier_id=tt5.supplier_id
and tt1.commodity_pk_id=tt5.commodity_info_id
left join
(select pr.schema_name, pr.supplier_id, pr.org_id,
prc.commodity_info_id,
sum(prc.quantity) as refundsCount, sum(prc.total_amount) as refundsAmount from purchase_refunds pr, purchase_refunds_commodity prc ,c_commodity c where 1=1
and c.commodity_code like '%'||#{commodityCode, jdbcType=VARCHAR}||'%'
and c.commodity_name like '%'||#{commodityName, jdbcType=VARCHAR}||'%'
and c.brand_code=#{brandName, jdbcType=VARCHAR}
and c.catalog_code=#{catalogName, jdbcType=VARCHAR}
and c.model_code=#{modelName, jdbcType=VARCHAR}
and prc.commodity_info_id=c.pk_id
and pr.delete_flag = '1' and pr.refunds_status = '1' and prc.delete_flag = '1' and pr.operation_type=2 and pr.last_up_time between #{start} and #{end} and pr.schema_name = prc.schema_name and pr.pk_id = prc.refunds_id group by pr.schema_name, pr.supplier_id, pr.org_id
,prc.commodity_info_id
) t22 on tt1.schema_name =t22.schema_name and tt1.org_id =t22.org_id and tt1.supplier_id =t22.supplier_id
and tt1.commodity_pk_id =t22.commodity_info_id
left join
(select pwi.schema_name,
pwi.supplier_id, pwi.org_id,
wic.commodity_info_id,
sum(wic.quantity) as wareInCount, sum(wic.total_amount) as wareInAmount from purchase_warehouse_in pwi, urchase_warehouse_in_commodity wic ,c_commodity c where 1=1
and c.commodity_code like '%'||#{commodityCode, jdbcType=VARCHAR}||'%'
and c.commodity_name like '%'||#{commodityName, jdbcType=VARCHAR}||'%'
and c.brand_code=#{brandName, jdbcType=VARCHAR}
and c.catalog_code=#{catalogName, jdbcType=VARCHAR}
and c.model_code=#{modelName, jdbcType=VARCHAR}
and wic.commodity_info_id=c.pk_id
and pwi.delete_flag = '1' and pwi.warehouse_in_status = '1' and wic.delete_flag = '1' and pwi.operation_type='2' and pwi.last_up_time between #{start} and #{end} and pwi.schema_name = wic.schema_name and pwi.pk_id = wic.warehouse_in_id group by pwi.schema_name, pwi.supplier_id, pwi.org_id
,wic.commodity_info_id
) t33 on tt1.schema_name =t33.schema_name and tt1.org_id =t33.org_id and tt1.supplier_id =t33.supplier_id
and tt1.commodity_pk_id =t33.commodity_info_id
left join
(select pe.schema_name, pe.supplier_id, pe.org_id,
peic.commodity_info_id,
sum(peic.quantity) as exchangeInCount, sum(peic.total_amount) as exchangeInAmount from purchase_exchange pe, purchase_exchange_in_commodity peic ,c_commodity c where 1=1
and c.commodity_code like '%'||#{commodityCode, jdbcType=VARCHAR}||'%'
and c.commodity_name like '%'||#{commodityName, jdbcType=VARCHAR}||'%'
and c.brand_code=#{brandName, jdbcType=VARCHAR}
and c.catalog_code=#{catalogName, jdbcType=VARCHAR}
and c.model_code=#{modelName, jdbcType=VARCHAR}
and peic.commodity_info_id=c.pk_id
and pe.delete_flag = '1' and pe.exchange_status = '1' and peic.delete_flag = '1' and pe.operation_type='2' and pe.last_up_time between #{start} and #{end} and pe.schema_name = peic.schema_name and pe.pk_id = peic.exchange_id group by pe.schema_name, pe.supplier_id, pe.org_id
,peic.commodity_info_id
) t44 on tt1.schema_name =t44.schema_name and tt1.org_id =t44.org_id and tt1.supplier_id =t44.supplier_id
and tt1.commodity_pk_id =t44.commodity_info_id
left join
(select pe.schema_name, pe.supplier_id, pe.org_id,
peoc.commodity_info_id,
sum(peoc.quantity) as exchangeOutCount, sum(peoc.total_amount) as exchangeOutAmount from purchase_exchange pe, urchase_exchange_out_commodity peoc ,c_commodity c where 1=1
and c.commodity_code like '%'||#{commodityCode, jdbcType=VARCHAR}||'%'
and c.commodity_name like '%'||#{commodityName, jdbcType=VARCHAR}||'%'
and c.brand_code=#{brandName, jdbcType=VARCHAR}
and c.catalog_code=#{catalogName, jdbcType=VARCHAR}
and c.model_code=#{modelName, jdbcType=VARCHAR}
and peoc.commodity_info_id=c.pk_id
and pe.delete_flag = '1' and pe.exchange_status = '1' and peoc.delete_flag = '1' and pe.operation_type='2' and pe.last_up_time between #{start} and #{end} and pe.schema_name = peoc.schema_name and pe.pk_id = peoc.exchange_id group by pe.schema_name, pe.supplier_id, pe.org_id
,peoc.commodity_info_id
) t55 on tt1.schema_name =t55.schema_name and tt1.org_id =t55.org_id and tt1.supplier_id =t55.supplier_id
and tt1.commodity_pk_id =t55.commodity_info_id
left join ( select ccd.schema_name,ccd.org_id,ccd.supplier_id,sum(ccd.valuation_amount) accountAmount from commodity_consignment_details ccd,c_commodity c where 1=1
and c.commodity_code like '%'||#{commodityCode, jdbcType=VARCHAR}||'%'
and c.commodity_name like '%'||#{commodityName, jdbcType=VARCHAR}||'%'
and c.brand_code=#{brandName, jdbcType=VARCHAR}
and c.catalog_code=#{catalogName, jdbcType=VARCHAR}
and c.model_code=#{modelName, jdbcType=VARCHAR}
and ccd.commodity_code=c.commodity_code and ccd.org_id=c.org_id
and ccd.delete_flag='1' and ccd.flag_account='1' and ccd.last_up_time between #{start} and #{end} group by ccd.schema_name,ccd.org_id,ccd.supplier_id) t66 on tt1.schema_name =t66.schema_name and tt1.org_id =t66.org_id and tt1.supplier_id =t66.supplier_id
) tot ,c_commodity t1 ,purchase_supplier ps where 1=1
and t1.schema_name=tot.schema_name
and ps.schema_name=tot.schema_name and ps.pk_id=tot.supplier_id
and t1.pk_id=tot.commodity_pk_id
and t1.commodity_code like '%'||#{commodityCode, jdbcType=VARCHAR}||'%'
and t1.commodity_name like '%'||#{commodityName, jdbcType=VARCHAR}||'%'
and t1.brand_code=#{brandName, jdbcType=VARCHAR}
and t1.catalog_code=#{catalogName, jdbcType=VARCHAR}
and t1.model_code=#{modelName, jdbcType=VARCHAR}

select commodityName, commodityCode, orgId, orgName, commodityId, catalogName, brandName, modelName, schemaName, whId, inventoryNum, safeInventory, unsalableDays,whName from( select tt2.commodityName commodityName, tt2.commodityCode commodityCode, tt2.org_id orgId, (select o.org_name from c_sys_organization o where o.pk_id=tt2.org_id)as orgName, tt2.commodity_id commodityId, tt2.catalogName catalogName, tt2.brandName brandName, tt2.modelName modelName, tt2.schema_name schemaName, tt2.warehouse_id whId, nvl(tt1.count1,'0') inventoryNum, tt2.safeInventory safeInventory,tt2.unsalableDays unsalableDays , tt2.warehouse_id,
(select swi.wh_name from storage_warehouse_info swi where swi.pk_id=tt2.warehouse_id) as whName from
(select sew.schema_name, t1.commodity_name commodityName, t1.commodity_code commodityCode, t1.org_id, t1.pk_id commodity_id, (select t2.brand_name from c_commodity_brand t2 where t2.delete_flag=1 and
t1.schema_name=t2.schema_name and t2.brand_code=t1.brand_code) as brandName, (select t3.catalog_name from c_commodity_catalog t3 where t3.delete_flag=1 and
t1.schema_name=t3.schema_name and t3.catalog_code=t1.catalog_code) as catalogName, (select t4.model_name from c_commodity_model t4 where t4.delete_flag=1 and
t1.schema_name=t4.schema_name and t4.model_code=t1.model_code ) as modelName, sew.safe_stock safeInventory,sew.unsalable_days unsalableDays , (select swi.pk_id from storage_warehouse_info swi where swi.wh_code=sew.wh_code and swi.org_id=sew.org_id) as warehouse_id from storage_early_warning sew , c_commodity t1 where 1=1 and sew.delete_flag='1' and t1.delete_flag='1'
and t1.commodity_code like '%'||#{commodityCode, jdbcType=VARCHAR}||'%'
and t1.commodity_name like '%'||#{commodityName, jdbcType=VARCHAR}||'%'
and t1.brand_code=#{brandName, jdbcType=VARCHAR}
and t1.catalog_code=#{catalogName, jdbcType=VARCHAR}
and t1.model_code=#{modelName, jdbcType=VARCHAR}
and t1.org_id in
#{org,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
and t1.org_id = #{orgId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
and sew.wh_code=(select swi.wh_code from storage_warehouse_info swi where swi.pk_id=#{warehouseId,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
and sew.commodity_code=t1.commodity_code and sew.org_id=t1.org_id and sew.schema_name=#{schemaName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}) tt2 left join
(select ii.schema_name, ii.commodity_info_id,ii.warehouse_id,sum(ii.quantity_on_hand) count1 from inventory_item ii group by ii.schema_name, ii.commodity_info_id,ii.warehouse_id)tt1 on tt1.commodity_info_id=tt2.commodity_id
and tt1.schema_name=tt2.schema_name and tt1.warehouse_id=tt2.warehouse_id) where safeInventory > inventoryNum

select t1.supplier_name supplier, (select min(t.create_time) from INVENTORY_ITEM_INFO t,INVENTORY_ITEM tt where tt.pk_id=t.inventory_item_id and t.info_content=t2.info_content and t.commodity_info_id=t2.commodity_info_id and tt.warehouse_id=t1.warehouse_id) inventoryInTime, t1.operation_type operationType, decode(t1.warehouse_mgt_way, '3', t1.quantity_on_hand, t2.quantity) quantity, t2.info_content infoContent from (select * from inventory_item ii where ii.delete_flag = '1' and ii.schema_name = #{schemaName} and ii.commodity_info_id = #{commodityId} and ii.warehouse_id = #{whId}) t1 left join (select * from inventory_item_info iii where iii.delete_flag = 1) t2 on t1.pk_id = t2.inventory_item_id and t1.commodity_info_id = t2.commodity_info_id

select supplier,inventoryInTime,operationType,infoContent,infoType,unsalable_days from( select ii.supplier_name supplier, (select min(t.create_time) from INVENTORY_ITEM_INFO t, INVENTORY_ITEM tt where tt.pk_id = t.inventory_item_id and t.info_content = iii.info_content and t.commodity_info_id = iii.commodity_info_id and tt.warehouse_id = ii.warehouse_id) inventoryInTime, ii.operation_type operationType, sew.unsalable_days, iii.info_content infoContent, iii.info_type infoType from inventory_item ii, storage_early_warning sew, inventory_item_info iii where ii.pk_id = iii.inventory_item_id and sew.commodity_code = (select c.commodity_code from c_commodity c where c.pk_id=iii.commodity_info_id) and sew.delete_flag = '1' and ii.delete_flag = '1' and iii.delete_flag = '1' and sew.schema_name = ii.schema_name and sew.wh_code = (select swi.wh_code from storage_warehouse_info swi where swi.pk_id=ii.warehouse_id) and ii.schema_name = #{schemaName} and ii.commodity_info_id = #{commodityId} and ii.warehouse_id = #{whId}) tt1 where to_char(sysdate - tt1.unsalable_days, 'yyyy/MM/dd') > inventoryInTime

select pwi.schema_name schemaName,
pwi.supplier_id supplierId, pwi.org_id orgId, pwi.operation_type operationType,
wic.commodity_info_id commodityId,
sum(wic.quantity) as wareInCount, sum(wic.total_amount) as wareInAmount from purchase_warehouse_in pwi, urchase_warehouse_in_commodity wic ,c_commodity c where 1=1
and c.commodity_code like '%'||#{commodityCode, jdbcType=VARCHAR}||'%'
and c.commodity_name like '%'||#{commodityName, jdbcType=VARCHAR}||'%'
and c.brand_code=#{brandName, jdbcType=VARCHAR}
and c.catalog_code=#{catalogName, jdbcType=VARCHAR}
and c.model_code=#{modelName, jdbcType=VARCHAR}
and wic.commodity_info_id=c.pk_id
and pwi.delete_flag = '1' and pwi.warehouse_in_status = '1'
and pwi.org_id in
#{org}
and pwi.org_id =#{orgId}
and pwi.schema_name = #{schemaName} and wic.delete_flag = '1' and pwi.last_up_time between #{start} and #{end} and pwi.schema_name = wic.schema_name and pwi.pk_id = wic.warehouse_in_id group by pwi.schema_name, pwi.supplier_id, pwi.org_id,
wic.commodity_info_id,
pwi.operation_type

select cd.schema_name schemaName, cd.org_id orgId,cad.supplier_id supplierId,
cad.commodity_code commodityCode,
sum(cad.commodity_num) saleOrderNum,sum(cad.commodity_price) actualAmount, sum(cad.commodity_price*cad.commodity_num) saleOrderAmount from market_commodity_add_details cad,market_commodity_add cd ,c_commodity c where 1=1
and c.commodity_code like '%'||#{commodityCode, jdbcType=VARCHAR}||'%'
and c.commodity_name like '%'||#{commodityName, jdbcType=VARCHAR}||'%'
and c.brand_code=#{brandName, jdbcType=VARCHAR}
and c.catalog_code=#{catalogName, jdbcType=VARCHAR}
and c.model_code=#{modelName, jdbcType=VARCHAR}
and cad.commodity_pk_id=c.pk_id
and cd.order_status='1' and cad.delete_flag='1' and cd.delete_flag=1 and cad.details_status='1' and cad.operation_type='2' and cad.complimentary_mark= #{mark} and cd.last_up_time between #{start} and #{end} and cd.schema_name=cad.schema_name and cad.order_number=cd.order_number and cd.schema_name=#{schemaName} group by cd.schema_name, cd.org_id,cad.supplier_id
, cad.commodity_code

select mca.schema_name schemaName,mca.org_id orgId,mca.supplier_id supplierId ,sum(mca.actual_receive_amount) proceedsAmount from market_consignment_account mca where 1=1 and mca.account_status='2' and mca.delete_flag='1' and mca.last_up_time between #{start} and #{end} group by mca.schema_name,mca.org_id,mca.supplier_id
